Emerging growth company&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9744; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Item&nbsp;8.01 Other Events. On August&nbsp;24, 2018, Broadcom Inc. (&#147;Broadcom&#148;) issued a press release announcing that the waiting period under the Hart-Scott-Rodino Antitrust Improvements Act of 1976, as amended, has expired with respect to Broadcom&#146;s proposed acquisition of CA, Inc. The foregoing description is qualified in its entirety by reference to the press release, dated August&nbsp;24, 2018, a copy of which is attached hereto as Exhibit 99.1 and incorporated herein by reference. &nbsp; Item&nbsp;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. (d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Exhibits &nbsp; Exhibit&nbsp;No. &nbsp;&nbsp; Description 99.1 &nbsp;&nbsp; Press Release, dated August&nbsp;24, 2018.
